page.title: 18ASLACKBY-LOCAL GOVERMENT
page.content: {LOCAL GOVERMENT { }Aslackby is under the influence of the South Kestiven District Coucil, Lincolnshire County Council and it also has it own Aslackby and Laughton Parish Council. {ASLACKBY AND LAUGHTON PARISH COUNCIL { MEETING - 7th JANUARY 1985 AT 8pm. } {AGENDA} 1. Apologies for absence 2. Minutes of previous meeting 12 November 1984 3. Matters arising from minutes (i) "Children Crossing" sign (ii) Improvements to footpaths (iii) Water on Airfield Road (iv) Cemetery (v) Water Supply (vi) Flooding of River Ave (vii) Burglaries (viii) Screening of Factory
